reference.shortdesc: Use a learningGroupMapRef element to include a map reference to a learning group map as part of a DITA learning map, learning bookmap, learning group map, or learningGroup element.

section.title: Description and Semantics
section.p: The learningGroupMapRef is a topicref specialization included in the DITA learning and training map domain. It is used to reference a single learning group map, either from a learning map, learning bookmap, learning group map or learningGroup element.

example.title: Example
example.codeblock: <map id="map_1234"> <title>Learning map with learningGroup map references</title> <!-- .... --> <!-- As child of map --> <learningGroupMapRef href="learningGroupMap1.ditamap" type="learningGroupMap" format="ditamap" scope="local"/> <!-- .... --> <learningGroup navtitle="Top-Level Learning Group"> <!-- .... --> <!-- As component of learningGroup --> <learningGroupMapRef href="learningGroupMap2.ditamap" type="learningGroupMap" format="ditamap" scope="local"/> <!-- .... --> </learningGroup> </map>
